auth.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
auth.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least {{count}} characters
auth.nameTooShort: Name must be at least {{count}} characters

socialLogin.disclaimer: By continuing, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy

error.title: Authentication Error
error.description: Failed to authenticate with {{provider}}. Please try again.

auth.loginDescription: Enter your email and password below to log into your account
auth.signOutDescription: Are you sure you want to sign out? You will need to sign in again to access your account.
auth.byClickingLogin: By clicking login, you agree to our
auth.forgotPasswordDescription: Enter your registered email and we will send you a link to reset your password.
auth.signUpDescription: Enter your email and password to create an account.
auth.signUpByCreating: By creating an account, you agree to our
auth.signUpPasswordTooShort7: Password must be at least 7 characters long
auth.signUpRegistrationFailed: Registration failed. Please check your information.
auth.signUpCheckInformation: Please check your information and try again
auth.signUpWelcome: Welcome {name}! Please check your email to verify your account.

organizations.title: Organizations
organizations.subtitle: Manage your organizations and switch between them
organizations.name: Organization Name
organizations.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this organization?
organizations.deleteDialogDescription: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone. All data associated with this organization will be permanently removed.
organizations.noOrganizationsDescription: Create your first organization to get started

pricing.title: Choose Your Plan
pricing.subtitle: Select the perfect plan for your team. Upgrade or downgrade anytime.

cancel.question: Can I cancel anytime?
cancel.answer: Yes! You can cancel your subscription at any time. Your plan will remain active until the end of your billing period.

change.question: Can I change plans?
change.answer: Absolutely! You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes will be prorated automatically.

payment.question: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.answer: We accept all major credit cards and debit cards through our secure payment processor, Stripe.

refund.question: Do you offer refunds?
refund.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied, contact us for a full refund.

invitations.inviteDescription: Send an invitation to join your organization via email.
invitations.messagePlaceholder: Welcome to our team! Looking forward to working with you.
invitations.messageDescription: Add a personal message to the invitation email (optional).
invitations.roleDescription: Choose the role for the new member.
invitations.inviteSentDescription: An invitation has been sent to {{email}}
invitations.inviteFailedGeneric: Failed to send invitation. Please try again.
invitations.noPendingInvitationsDescription: Invite team members to collaborate on your organization.
invitations.cancelInvitationDescription: This will permanently cancel the invitation. The recipient will no longer be able to accept it.
invitations.invitationCancelledDescription: The invitation has been successfully cancelled.
invitations.acceptInvitationDescription: You've been invited to join an organization. Accept the invitation to get started.
invitations.youHaveBeenInvited: You have been invited to join this organization.
invitations.invalidTokenDescription: This invitation link is invalid or has expired.
invitations.acceptSuccessDescription: You have successfully joined the organization.
invitations.acceptErrorDescription: We couldn't process your invitation. It may have expired or already been used.

emailVerification.pleaseWait: Please wait while we verify your email address...
emailVerification.successDescription: Your email has been successfully verified.

roles.viewerDescription: Can view content but cannot make changes

billing.title: Billing & Subscription
billing.subtitle: Manage your subscription and billing
billing.cancelScheduled: Your subscription will be canceled at the end of the billing period.
billing.usageDescription: Current usage of your plan resources

noSubscription.title: No Active Subscription
noSubscription.description: You don't have an active subscription yet.

billing.confirmCancel: Are you sure you want to cancel your subscription? It will remain active until the end of the billing period.
billing.cancelSuccess: Subscription canceled. It will remain active until the end of the billing period.
